feed.title: Coder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.1
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Bug fixes

  • Dashboard: Only render tooltip when require_active_version enabled (#13484, 3fbfb534d) (@sreya)
  • Dashboard: Show workspace start button when require_active_version is enabled (#13482, 5e69a9d18) (@coadler)

Compare: v2.12.0...v2.12.1

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.12.1

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.11.3
entry.content:
Changelog

Stable (since June 21, 2024)

Features

  • Add cross-origin reporting for telemetry in the dashboard (#13612, 350c71b22)

Bug fixes

  • Remove connected button (#13625, bfb4a8df1)
  • Track login page correctly (#13618, 203a18293)
  • Display trial errors in the dashboard (#13601, 62fdea0aa) (@kylecarbs)
  • Write server config to telemetry (#13590, fefb4e655)

Compare: v2.11.2...v2.11.3

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.11.3

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.2
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.11.4
entry.content:
Changelog

Stable (since June 24, 2024)

Chores

  • External auth validate response "Forbidden" should return invalid, not an error (#13446, d6ca71271) (@Emyrk)

    This caused an issue where some workspaces would become undeletable.

Compare: v2.11.3...v2.11.4

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.11.4

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.3
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Chores

  • External auth validate response "Forbidden" should return invalid, not an error (#13446, 534d4ea75) (@Emyrk)

    This caused an issue where some workspaces would become undeletable.
